e3c8477104e4dfbb.title: What is the meaning of life?

messages.content: What is the meaning of life?

f52d1b4a56598b21.title: Create the following with python: setup), …

messages.content:
Create the following with python: setup), your UI currently has:
	•	A FastAPI web server (Uvicorn) serving a simple HTML page (not a full frontend framework).
	•	Project awareness via the manifest (agent.manifest): it can point at a default project and read what’s on disk.
	•	Read-only viewing of stored stuff through helper loaders (you had imports like load_bible_text, load_draft), so it can display existing outputs (drafts / bible text / run artifacts) rather than “edit everything in place.”
	•	Config knobs via env vars (ex: OLLAMA_HOST, AGT_PROJECT, AGT_MAX_CONTEXT_CHARS), so you can change behavior without touching code.

And what it doesn’t really have yet (or is currently broken, per your note):
	•	A working Deep Research tab / pipeline (yours is failing).
	•	A real model selector UI that actually lists models.
	•	The router option in the selector (auto-pick model).
	•	A multi-chat sidebar + chat management + rich text editor (that’s still in the “overhaul” wishlist zone).

a4f6ffdcb158b18b.prompt: What is the meaning of life?

steps.text: Use Update to add constraints mid-run
